annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: as added Feb. 24, 1987, D.C. Law 6-177, § 2(a), 33 DCR 7241

annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary repeal of section, see § 301(o) of the Fiscal Year 1996 Budget Support Emergency Act of 1996 (D.C. Act 11-264, April 26, 1996, 43 DCR 2412), and § 201(o) of the Fiscal Year 1996 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 1996 (D.C. Act 11-335, August 1, 1996, 43 DCR 4256).
